title: Update header title to ZenBreathe

requirements.text: Change the app’s top header/title text in the shared layout to display “ZenBreathe” instead of “Breathe”.

quotes: change the name on the top to ZenBreathe

acceptanceCriteria: When viewing any route that shows the shared header (e.g., Home, Stats, Custom, Settings, About), the centered header title reads “ZenBreathe”.
No other header layout behavior changes (e.g., Home-only icons, spacing) aside from the title text.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn UI components are read-only).
Do not edit any paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not rename or rebrand other in-app text (e.g., About page headings/body copy) unless explicitly requested.
Do not change PWA manifest metadata or HTML document title (these already use “ZenBreathe”).
